reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 47/21: GRANT PROGRAM - SECTION 11.4.1 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: GRANT PROGRAM — SECTION 11.4.1 OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 47/21: GRANT PROGRAM - SECTION 11.4.1 OF THE ACT

content.content: 1. The program specified for the purposes of section 11.4.1 of the Act is the program consisting of the following: 1.  Main Street Relief Grant for Personal Protective Equipment (PPE). 2.  Property Tax Rebate Grant. 3.  Energy Cost Rebate Grant. 4.  Ontario Small Business Support Grant. 5.  Ontario Tourism and Travel Small Business Support Grant. 6.  Winery Agri-Tourism COVID-19 Relief Initiative. 7.  Ontario Business Costs Rebate Program. 8.  Ontario COVID-19 Small Business Relief Grant. O. Reg. 47/21, s. 1; O. Reg. 523/21, s. 1; O. Reg. 700/21, s. 1; O. Reg. 32/22, s. 1; O. Reg. 102/22, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The program specified for the purposes of section 11.4.1 of the Act is the program consisting of the following:

1.  Main Street Relief Grant for Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).

2.  Property Tax Rebate Grant.

3.  Energy Cost Rebate Grant.

4.  Ontario Small Business Support Grant.

5.  Ontario Tourism and Travel Small Business Support Grant.

6.  Winery Agri-Tourism COVID-19 Relief Initiative.

7.  Ontario Business Costs Rebate Program.

8.  Ontario COVID-19 Small Business Relief Grant. O. Reg. 47/21, s. 1; O. Reg. 523/21, s. 1; O. Reg. 700/21, s. 1; O. Reg. 32/22, s. 1; O. Reg. 102/22, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
